before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8bf8p","text":"Important note:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89vvd","text":"While LAMP1 immunofluorescence staining robustly gives expected results, after multiple rounds of optimization, anti-LRRK2 antibody generates significant non-specific signals in the LRRK2 KO cell lines in our hand. This is a warning that this antibody may not be reliable for Immunofluorescence staining experiments. However, this protocol can be used widely for IF experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehctt","text":"Please check This google sheet to learn more about the cell lines and conditions tested for the antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":17}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6A677850325C11EEBFC2D71324883B23","url":"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1N9OoLE8lkQvIOl_ZKsW6p-rRGdG0PVM00Uzb1VqPhU4/edit?usp=sharing"}}}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"eq9qp","text":"GDB buffer was used as blocking buffer in the optimized protocol.\nThis protocol uses ibidi 8 Well Chamber µ-Slides and will coat them with Fibronectin. Standard volume would be 300 uL for each well. Volumes will need altering for wells, other plates and slides. \nAll steps are performed at room temperature (RT) on the lab bench, except for methanol permeabilization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1u2kd","text":"(0.1M) NaPi pH 7.4
3.1 g of NaH2PO4•H2O
0.9 g of Na2HPO4 (anhydrous)
distilled H2O to make a volume of 1 L
The pH of the final solution will be 7.4. This buffer can be stored for up to 1 mo at 4°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dpd5r","text":"GDB buffer
30mM NaPi (sodium phosphate) pH 7.4
0.45mM NaCl
0.2% porcine (or fish) gelatin
In ddH2O","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnhip","text":"Kim wipes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6lrk","text":"Ethanol (100%, stored in dark chemicals cupboard)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq19","text":"Water (double-deionised H2O from Milli-Q, “MQ-H2O”)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: After multiple rounds of optimization, anti-LRRK2 antibody generates significant non-specific signals in the LRRK2 KO cell lines so this antibody may not be reliable for Immunofluorescence staining experiments. The protocol can be used for general IF experiments.
